def addValuatorPropertiesToDialog(self):
        self.addPropertyToDialog(
            'base',
            {'widget': self._valuator,
             'type': 'real',
             'help': 'Dial value = base + delta * numRevs'})
        self.addPropertyToDialog(
            'delta',
            {'widget': self._valuator,
             'type': 'real',
             'help': 'Dial value = base + delta * numRevs'})
        self.addPropertyToDialog(
            'numSegments',
            {'widget': self._valuator,
             'type': 'integer',
             'help': 'Number of segments to divide dial into.'})
